headline: Permian Resources (PR): Among the Best Crude Oil Stocks to Buy Now
summary: Permian Resources Corporation (NYSE:PR) is included among the Best Crude Oil Stocks to Buy According to Hedge Funds. One of the fastest-growing companies in the American crude oil sector, the share price of Permian Resources Corporation (NYSE:PR) has gained by more than 1,600% over the last five years.
